amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the antitrust exemption shall not apply to negotiations over fees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 106-709 to prevent doctors, or any health care professional covered in the bill, from using the language to negotiate fees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 78 - 338 (Roll no. 370).
